argument.description: An expression that specifies the string values to be aggregated.
An expression that specifies the string values to be aggregated.
Specifies the order of the rows from the same grouping set that are processed in the aggregation.
The sort key can be a column name or a sort-key-expression.

description: The LISTAGG function aggregates a set of string elements into one string by concatenating the strings. Optionally, a separator string can be provided which is inserted between contiguous input strings.
